snippet: The Library of Congress is putting photographs by Camilo José Vergara online, and will update the archive as he continues his time-lapse studies of sites in certain cities.
abstract: The Library of Congress is putting photographs by Camilo José Vergara online, and will update the archive as he continues his time-lapse studies of sites in certain cities.

headline.main: Bringing Time-Lapse Photo Studies Into Real Time, Online
